A website under construction by a nerd

Have you ever wondered, "Hey I wonder what a partially-finished website would look like?" You probably haven't, I don't think that's a common question. But if you did, this would be one example!

I would like to specifically apologize to anyone looking to this website to gauge my hirability, I have not had as much time to work on this website as I would have liked. Despite this, I still thought it would be a good idea to put it on applications if only to show that I have worked on something before, and I am planning on updating and adding content in my free time during the near future.
